[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [TextElement](./harp-mapview.textelement.md)

## TextElement class

`TextElement` is used to create 2D text elements (for example, labels).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TextElement 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(text, points, renderParams, layoutParams, priority, xOffset, yOffset, featureId, style, fadeNear, fadeFar, tileOffset, offsetDirection)](./harp-mapview.textelement._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new <code>TextElement</code>. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [alwaysOnTop](./harp-mapview.textelement.alwaysontop.md) |  | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the label will always be rendered on top. If overlapping with other labels, the render order is undefined;  <code>false</code> |
|  [bounds](./harp-mapview.textelement.bounds.md) |  | THREE.Box2 | Screen space bounds for this <code>TextElement</code>. Used by point labels in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\]. Valid after <code>loadingState</code> is <code>Initialized</code>. |
|  [dbgPathTooSmall](./harp-mapview.textelement.dbgpathtoosmall.md) |  | boolean |  If <code>true</code>, the estimated bounding box of the path is too small for the label to fit, so it is being ignored for rendering in the latest frame. |
|  [distanceScale](./harp-mapview.textelement.distancescale.md) |  | number | Scaling factor of text. Defaults to 0.5, reducing the size ot 50% in the distance. |
|  [elevated](./harp-mapview.textelement.elevated.md) |  | boolean | If set to <code>true</code> the geometry has been already overlaid on elevation. |
|  [fadeFar](./harp-mapview.textelement.fadefar.md) |  | number \| undefined |  |
|  [fadeNear](./harp-mapview.textelement.fadenear.md) |  | number \| undefined |  |
|  [featureId](./harp-mapview.textelement.featureid.md) |  | number \| undefined |  |
|  [glyphCaseArray](./harp-mapview.textelement.glyphcasearray.md) |  | boolean\[\] |  Array storing the casing (<code>true</code>: uppercase, <code>false</code>: lowercase) for this <code>TextElement</code>. Used by labels in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\] to support <code>SmallCaps</code>. Valid after <code>loadingState</code> is <code>Initialized</code>. |
|  [glyphs](./harp-mapview.textelement.glyphs.md) |  | [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  Array storing the style \[\[GlyphData\]\] for this <code>TextElement</code> to speed up label placement in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\]. Valid after <code>loadingState</code> is <code>Initialized</code>. |
|  [HIGHEST\_PRIORITY](./harp-mapview.textelement.highest_priority.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Text elements with this priority are placed on screen before any others. |
|  [ignoreDistance](./harp-mapview.textelement.ignoredistance.md) |  | boolean | Ignore distance limit. Used for label in labeled-icons. |
|  [kind](./harp-mapview.textelement.kind.md) |  | [GeometryKind](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykind.md) \| [GeometryKindSet](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykindset.md) | Specified kind of geometry. One kind is set as default in the technique, and can be overridden in the style. |
|  [layoutParams](./harp-mapview.textelement.layoutparams.md) |  | [TextLayoutParameters](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutparameters.md) \| [TextLayoutStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.md) |  |
|  [layoutStyle](./harp-mapview.textelement.layoutstyle.md) |  | [TextLayoutStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.md) \| undefined |  |
|  [loadingState](./harp-mapview.textelement.loadingstate.md) |  | [LoadingState](./harp-mapview.loadingstate.md) |  Used during rendering. |
|  [maxZoomLevel](./harp-mapview.textelement.maxzoomlevel.md) |  | number | Determines maximum zoom level for visibility. Can be used to reduce the number of visible <code>TextElement</code>s based on zoom level. |
|  [mayOverlap](./harp-mapview.textelement.mayoverlap.md) |  | boolean | If <code>true</code>, label is allowed to overlap other labels or icons of lower priority.  <code>false</code> |
|  [minZoomLevel](./harp-mapview.textelement.minzoomlevel.md) |  | number | Determines minimum zoom level for visibility. Can be used to reduce the number of visible <code>TextElement</code>s based on zoom level. |
|  [offsetDirection](./harp-mapview.textelement.offsetdirection.md) |  | number \| undefined |  |
|  [path](./harp-mapview.textelement.path.md) |  | THREE.Vector3\[\] \| undefined | The list of points in world space used to render the text along a path or <code>undefined</code>. |
|  [pathLengthSqr](./harp-mapview.textelement.pathlengthsqr.md) |  | number |  |
|  [poiInfo](./harp-mapview.textelement.poiinfo.md) |  | [PoiInfo](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.md) \| undefined | Contains additional information about icon to be rendered along with text. |
|  [points](./harp-mapview.textelement.points.md) |  | THREE.Vector3\[\] \| THREE.Vector3 |  |
|  [position](./harp-mapview.textelement.position.md) |  | THREE.Vector3 | The text element position or the first point of the path used to render a curved text, both in world space. |
|  [priority](./harp-mapview.textelement.priority.md) |  | number |  |
|  [renderOrder](./harp-mapview.textelement.renderorder.md) |  | number | If specified, determines the render order between <code>TextElement</code>s. The number different renderOrders should be as small as possible, because every specific <code>renderOrder</code> may result in one or more draw calls.<!-- -->TextElements with the same integer <code>renderOrder</code> will be rendered in the same batch.<!-- -->The <code>renderOrder</code> of <code>TextElement</code>s are only relative to other <code>TextElement</code>s, and not other map elements.<!-- -->A <code>TextElement</code> with a higher <code>renderOrder</code> will be rendered after a <code>TextElement</code> with a lower <code>renderOrder</code>. |
|  [renderParams](./harp-mapview.textelement.renderparams.md) |  | [TextRenderParameters](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderparameters.md) \| [TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md) |  |
|  [renderStyle](./harp-mapview.textelement.renderstyle.md) |  | [TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md) \| undefined |  |
|  [reserveSpace](./harp-mapview.textelement.reservespace.md) |  | boolean | If <code>true</code>, label will reserve screen space, other markers of lower priority will not be able to overlap.  <code>true</code> |
|  [style](./harp-mapview.textelement.style.md) |  | string \| undefined |  |
|  [text](./harp-mapview.textelement.text.md) |  | string |  |
|  [textBufferObject](./harp-mapview.textelement.textbufferobject.md) |  | [TextBufferObject](./harp-text-canvas.textbufferobject.md) |  Pre-computed text vertex buffer. Used by point labels in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\]. Valid after label becomes visible for the first time. |
|  [textFadeTime](./harp-mapview.textelement.textfadetime.md) |  | number | Time to fade in text in milliseconds.  \[\[DEFAULT\_FADE\_TIME\]\] 800 |
|  [textMayOverlap](./harp-mapview.textelement.textmayoverlap.md) |  | boolean | If <code>true</code>, <code>TextElement</code> is allowed to overlap other labels or icons of lower priority. <code>false</code> |
|  [textReservesSpace](./harp-mapview.textelement.textreservesspace.md) |  | boolean | If <code>true</code>, <code>TextElement</code> will reserve screen space, other markers of lower priority will not be able to overlap. <code>true</code> |
|  [tileOffset](./harp-mapview.textelement.tileoffset.md) |  | number \| undefined |  |
|  [type](./harp-mapview.textelement.type.md) |  | TextElementType |  |
|  [userData](./harp-mapview.textelement.userdata.md) |  | any | Optional user data. Will be retrieved during picking. |
|  [visible](./harp-mapview.textelement.visible.md) |  | boolean | Determines visibility. If set to <code>false</code>, it will not be rendered. |
|  [xOffset](./harp-mapview.textelement.xoffset.md) |  | number |  |
|  [yOffset](./harp-mapview.textelement.yoffset.md) |  | number |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [hasFeatureId()](./harp-mapview.textelement.hasfeatureid.md) |  |  |
|  [updateMinMaxZoomLevelsFromPoiInfo()](./harp-mapview.textelement.updateminmaxzoomlevelsfrompoiinfo.md) |  | Update the minZoomLevel and maxZoomLevel from the values set in \[\[PoiInfo\]\]. Selects the smaller/larger one of the two min/max values for icon and text, because the TextElement is a container for both. |
